name: Jumpin' Joe!
description:
Jump between buildings, shoot bad guys, and aim for a high score!

Watch for a countdown in the corner of the screen, when the countdown ends, the game will speed up, but your gun will see a boost in power and the ability to boost you into the air!

All sprites, sound effects, and music is made by me. I used Aseprite for the sprites, jfxr for sounds, and beepbox for music.
